p: A study conducted by Saleem et al. showed that the meth anolic extracts of OD cladodes and its pure compounds like Î±-pyrone glycoside and opuntioside-I can exert a hypotensive effect in normotensive rats [ 76]. A review by Talha et al. on the herbal hypotensive compounds has reported OD as a plant containing hypotensive properties [ 77].
